Package nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard

Class FPSCounter

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.GameObject
nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard.Dashboard
nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard.FPSCounter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAlarmListener, IKeyInput, IMouseInput, processing.core.PConstants
public class FPSCounter
extends Dashboard
implements IAlarmListener
The FPSCounter is used by the GameEngine and shows the Frames Per Second on the screen.
